Content.Text:
<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Talk... with you, <MYNAME>? I've
nothing... nothing to say.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard... heard you took a trip.
Shall I tell you about it?

We just met up and the conversation is
over already! I wanted to talk to her
a bit more than that.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's go... go to the house.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tell me. Where... where did you go?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That... that was fun. You can tell
stories... well, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want... to hear more. Will you...
tell me again?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
...Thank you. I... look forward to it.
